title: Ep. 511 - The Noose That Wasn’t
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, it wasn’t a noose as any intelligent person already knew. But still the Left, the media, and Bubba Wallace are trying to hang onto the narrative even as it’s exposed as fraudulent. We’ll sort through this today. And I want to pay special attention to the fact that the FBI sent 15 federal agents to investigate a rope. Also Five Headlines including “protesters” tearing down a statue of an abolitionist. Why? I’ll explain the real reason why all of these statues are coming down.

If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/walsh
